title: `H3` input features fail to save in Dask/Ray Backend
body:
Attempting to do so leads to a ValueError having to do with casting the feature into an int.
```
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError(ValueError): ray::dask:('len-254a5c93f367482514c52c4117b9e969', 1) (pid=650, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('astype-b5571a7859566301ef5e699ae007a489', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('dropna-fb0c485c886c1d8e29c3d43d9dc35abc', 1) (pid=650, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('assign-1c0dbe40ffb294a3389af02f5e311bb9', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('assign-0d66479fdac2de0ac41302e27f5a4339', 1) (pid=650, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('map-d90264b18683ff54afc04a16b571c92d', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('map-4176fc6d09154b1c0496cd01039f81e5', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('fillna-1756744a1c0782ba9ee401a590add773', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         At least one of the input arguments for this task could not be computed:
E                       ray.exceptions.RayTaskError: ray::dask:('astype-5cdca27eb323c313868e768470c5d779', 1) (pid=640, ip=127.0.0.1)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/util/dask/scheduler.py", line 432, in dask_task_wrapper
E                           result = func(*actual_args)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/optimization.py", line 990, in __call__
E                           return core.get(self.dsk, self.outkey, dict(zip(self.inkeys, args)))
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/core.py", line 149, in get
E                           result = _execute_task(task, cache)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/core.py", line 119, in _execute_task
E                           return func(*(_execute_task(a, cache) for a in args))
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/utils.py", line 71, in apply
E                           return func(*args, **kwargs)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dask/utils.py", line 1102, in __call__
E                           return getattr(__obj, self.method)(*args, **kwargs)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/generic.py", line 5912, in astype
E                           new_data = self._mgr.astype(dtype=dtype, copy=copy, errors=errors)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/internals/managers.py", line 419, in astype
E                           return self.apply("astype", dtype=dtype, copy=copy, errors=errors)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/internals/managers.py", line 304, in apply
E                           applied = getattr(b, f)(**kwargs)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py", line 580, in astype
E                           new_values = astype_array_safe(values, dtype, copy=copy, errors=errors)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/cast.py", line 1292, in astype_array_safe
E                           new_values = astype_array(values, dtype, copy=copy)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/cast.py", line 1237, in astype_array
E                           values = astype_nansafe(values, dtype, copy=copy)
E                         File "/Users/geoffreyangus/repositories/predibase/ludwig/venv38/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pandas/core/dtypes/cast.py", line 1154, in astype_nansafe
E                           return lib.astype_intsafe(arr, dtype)
E                         File "pandas/_libs/lib.pyx", line 668, in pandas._libs.lib.astype_intsafe
E                       ValueError: invalid literal for int() with base 10: '6.365917510171576e+17'
```
To reproduce, navigate to `tests/integration_tests/test_ray.py::test_ray_save_inputs_with_nans` , uncomment the `h3_feature()` input feature, then run the test.
